scripts.dev: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30002 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=dev NODE_DOMAIN=127.0.0.1:3000 NODE_DEBUG_LEVEL=debug BACKEND_AUTH=N node ./bin/www
scripts.uat: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30002 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=uat NODE_DOMAIN=dit24-win10.aegon.com.tw:80 NODE_DEBUG_LEVEL=debug BACKEND_AUTH=Y node ./bin/www
scripts.prod: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30002 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=prod NODE_DOMAIN=127.0.0.1 BACKEND_AUTH=Y node ./bin/www
scripts.pm2-dev: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30002 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=dev NODE_DOMAIN=127.0.0.1:3000 NODE_DEBUG_LEVEL=debug BACKEND_AUTH=N pm2 start pm2.start.json
scripts.pm2-uat: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30002 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=uat NODE_DOMAIN=dit24-win10.aegon.com.tw:80 NODE_DEBUG_LEVEL=debug BACKEND_AUTH=Y pm2 start pm2.start.json
scripts.pm2-prod: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30002 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=prod NODE_DOMAIN=127.0.0.1 BACKEND_AUTH=Y pm2 start pm2.start.json
